title: Player Reports In-Game Cheating
description: A player submits a report with video evidence of another player using an aimbot in a competitive match.

tasks.description: Retrieve the player report, including the reported player's ID and the attached video evidence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully accesses all details of the report.

tasks.description: Analyze the reported player's match history and performance stats for anomalies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the player's headshot accuracy stat is unnaturally high (95%).

tasks.description: Based on the evidence and stat analysis, issue a permanent ban to the cheating player.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies a permanent ban to the player's account.
